text: The current flag of Kazakhstan () was adopted on 4 June 1992. It replaced the flag of the Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic. == Historical flags == File:Kazakh Khanate.svg| Flag of the Kazakh Khanate File:Flag of the Alash Autonomy.svg|Flag of the Alash Autonomy File:Flag_of_Kazakh_SSR_(1937-1940).svg|Flag of the Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic from 1937—1940 File:Qazaq SSR 40-53.svg|Flag of the Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic from 1940—1953 File:Flag of the Kazakh SSR.svg|Flag of the Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic from 1953—1991 == References == Kazakh Category:Kazakhstan
title: Flag of Kazakhstan
